items.name: hero-section-v1
items.title: Hero Section V1
items.description: An editorial-style hero section with left-aligned serif heading, split description/CTA, and metric strip

items.name: hero-section-v2
items.title: Hero Section V2
items.description: An editorial-style hero with asymmetric layout, serif display typography, and diagonal accents

items.name: hero-section-v3
items.title: Hero Section V3
items.description: A dark hero section with shader background and mouse-reactive particles

items.name: hero-section-v4
items.title: Hero Section V4
items.description: A blue themed split hero section with dithering shader sphere and gradient accent heading

items.name: hero-section-v5
items.title: Hero Section V5
items.description: A monochromatic centered SaaS hero section with serif heading, CTA button, theme-aware dashboard showcase image, and three feature cards
items.docs:
The dashboard images are loaded from a remote URL by default.

Replace the `DASHBOARD_LIGHT` and `DASHBOARD_DARK` constants at the top of the file with your own product screenshots.

items.name: feature-section-v1
items.title: Feature Section V1
items.description: A centered feature section with headline, description, and four horizontal feature icons
items.docs:
The card images are loaded from a remote URL by default.

Replace the `PLACEHOLDER_IMAGE` constant at the top of the file with your own image.

items.name: cta-section-v1
items.title: CTA Section V1
items.description: An editorial CTA section with warm rose accent, ornamental divider, display serif headline, and atmospheric background glow

items.name: cta-section-v2
items.title: CTA Section V2
items.description: A modern minimalist CTA card with organic NeuroNoise shader background and clean typography

items.name: cta-section-v3
items.title: CTA Section V3
items.description: A modern minimalist CTA section with muted background, geometric precision, and a single download action

items.name: blog-section-v1
items.title: Blog Section V1
items.description: A magazine-style blog grid with editorial card hierarchy and image-driven storytelling

items.name: faq-section-v1
items.title: FAQ Section V1
items.description: An editorial accordion FAQ section with serif display headline, smooth expand/collapse animations, and refined dividers

items.name: faq-section-v2
items.title: FAQ Section V2
items.description: A modern split-layout FAQ with sticky heading, numbered card-based accordion items, and monospace numbering

items.name: faq-section-v3
items.title: FAQ Section V3
items.description: A timeline-inspired FAQ with sticky editorial header, layered panels, and compact metadata labels

items.name: feature-section-v2
items.title: Feature Section V2
items.description: An asymmetric bento-grid feature section with image showcase and editorial styling

items.name: feature-section-v3
items.title: Feature Section V3
items.description: A minimal feature section with centered serif heading, subtitle, and three icon-driven feature cards in a horizontal grid

items.name: feature-section-v4
items.title: Feature Section V4
items.description: A structured grid feature section with centered heading, icon cards in a 4-column layout, and crosshair markers at grid intersections

items.name: feature-section-v5
items.title: Feature Section V5
items.description: A dark editorial-style feature section with centered heading and a 3x2 bordered card grid using circular placeholder icons

items.name: feature-section-v6
items.title: Feature Section V6
items.description: An asymmetric split-panel feature section with a sticky intro, decorative pixel-dot grid, and horizontal feature rows using Geist Pixel font numbers
